scaling_strategy.rule: All padding, margin, border, and shadows are calculated using 'calc(N * var(--px-unit))'.

page_layouts.title: EMPLOYEE ACCESS PORTAL
page_layouts.purpose: NFC entry point and initial authorization

layout_desktop.column_left: Permanent Navigation Menu (6 options + Status Board link)
layout_desktop.column_right: Dynamic SYSTEM LOG / NARRATOR Feed (Live text update area)

elements: Main Content Area (Scrollable cards for charts/info)

layout_desktop.column_center: Live ID Card Preview (Large Canvas Output)

elements: Top: Live Preview (Full Width Scaled Canvas)
Middle: Form Inputs (Full Width, Large Tap Targets)
Bottom Fixed: Export/Save Button (44px height min)

page_layouts.title: CONSCIOUSNESS ADAPTATION TEST
page_layouts.purpose: Horror/Uncanny Valley questionnaire for organ mapping

layout_desktop.column_right: Visual/Image Options (Symmetrically placed distorted pixel art)

layout_mobile.notes: Use horizontal swipe gesture to change questions.

page_layouts.title: ARCHIVE 2801: FEN QING MODULARITY
page_layouts.purpose: Display status of the 5 collected inner organ modules

elements: Middle: Selected Module Detail (Full Screen Scrollable)
Bottom Fixed: Status Quick View (Sanity/Stamina Bar)
